review: Bought this for one reason - to use with my Plex media server. Unfortunately playback keeps freezing. Apparently this problem isn't isolated to my unit -- a lot of Plex users are complaining about same problems in the Plex forums. If you're buying this to watch Amazon Prime Video or Netflix, I'm sure it's a good product, but if you're looking to use it with Plex, save yourself the aggravation (luckily I returned it before throwing the Fire TV box into the Intracoastal).
author: Brian Styles

review: I have used Roku for years and was looking forward to the Apple Fire Stick. When it arrive - a bummer - Livestream is not available as an app on Fire Stick. It is on all forms of Roku. This is an important public service app and should be on Fire Stick. I am considering returning the product.
